name: Microsoft Excel MIME HTML Spreadsheet
summary: An XLSMHTML file is an archived MIME HTML spreadsheet saved by Microsoft Excel (2007 and earlier), a common spreadsheet application. It contains HTML code that represents the spreadsheet in a format similar to the original .XLS file. XLSMHTML files are used for viewing published spreadsheets in a web browser.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: No longer supported by Microsoft Excel

macos.display_name: No longer supported by Microsoft Excel
